#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int gcd(int a, int b) {
	if (a > b) {
		a = a + b;
		b = a - b;
		a = a - b;
	}

	while (a > 0 && b > 0) {
		if (b > a) {
			b = b - a;
		} else {
			a = a - b;
		}
	}

	return (a == 0) ? b : a;
}

int main (int argc, char** argv) {
	int t, n;
	
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
		cin >> n;
		int sum = 1;
		for (int i = 2; i <= n - 1; ++i) {
			if (n % i == 0) {
				continue;
			}

			if (gcd(i, n) != 1) {
				continue;
			}
			
			++sum;
		}
		
		cout << sum << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
